Estate Lite Plone Theme
=======================

Estate Lite Plone Theme (quintagroup.theme.estatelite) is one of Plone skins from Alternative Plone Skins and Themes project.

  &copy; "Quintagroup":http://quintagroup.com, 2006-2009

It is a lite version of Quintagroup Premium Estate Modern Plone Theme.

Features
--------

 * Second-column portlets are placed at the bottom of the content area
 
 * Default search is replaced with Search portlet
 
 * Semantic mark-up

Estate Lite Plone Theme is available at http://pypi.python.org/pypi/quintagroup.theme.estatelite.

Recommended
-----------

  * Lite Theme developed and tested on Plone 3.3
    (python-2.4.4, Zope-2.10.9)

Home Directory
--------------

  http://skins.quintagroup.com/estate-lite

Authors
-------

  * Yuriy Hvozdovych
